condition:
[AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(Exp HS Redundant Servers)*>,Yes),[EQ](<*VALUE(New_Expansion)*>,New),[IF]([EQ](<*Eval(LCASE("<* TABLE ( SELECT Booking_Country FROM PMC_Exp_HS_Dongle_Product_BookingCountry 
WHERE  Booking_Country = '<*Eval(LCASE("<*CTX( Quote.CustomField(Booking Country) )*>"))*>' ) *>"))*>,<*Eval(LCASE("<*CTX( Quote.CustomField(Booking Country) )*>"))*>)){1}{0}[ENDIF])
name: Experion HS USB Dongle Redundant Server Yes
description:
If the opportunity country is China / Korea / Taiwan / Indonesia / Pakistan / Thailand / Hong Kong / Vietnam 
If Redundant Servers?=YES then Qty Value=2; Else Qty Value=1
